events.text:
We don't have many men to spare and the gnolls expansion have been too much for us to handle.
They now surround our outpost leaving us with two fronts to fight them on, and it's only a matter of time until we are overrun if nothing is done.
My scouts reports a gnoll messenger has been seen traveling between their northern and southern base.
I want you to bring me whatever that beast is carrying.
Hail, were you able to locate the messenger?
This here shows what their plans are, let me see...
